info.description: Provides create, retrieve, update and delete (CRUD) services for  Acumos data including solutions, artifacts and users.  All service endpoints require basic HTTP authentication.
info.title: Acumos Common Data Service REST API

get.summary: Gets the list of peers with access to the specified restricted catalog; empty if none are found.
Gets the list of catalog IDs accessible to the specified peer; empty if none are found.
Checks if the specified peer can read the specified catalog. Returns non-zero if yes, zero if no.

post.summary: Add read access to the specified restricted catalog for the specified peer. Answers bad request if an ID is invalid.

delete.summary: Removes read access to the specified restricted catalog for the specified peer.

get.summary: Checks if the specified peer can read the specified solution. Returns non-zero if yes, zero if no.
Gets the list of users who were granted write access to the specified solution.

post.summary: Grants write permission for the specified user to the specified solution. Returns bad request if an ID is not found

delete.summary: Removes write permission for the specified user from the specified solution. Returns bad request if an ID is not found

get.summary: Gets a page of solutions for which the user has write permission but is not the owner, optionally sorted on fields. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Checks if the specified user can read the specified solution. Returns non-zero if yes, zero if no.
Gets a page of artifacts, optionally sorted; empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new artifact and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on bad URI, constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the count of artifacts.
Searches for artifacts with names or descriptions that contain the search term using the like operator; empty if no matches are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Searches for artifacts with attributes matching the values specified as query parameters. Defaults to match all (conjunction); send junction query parameter '_j=o' to match any (disjunction).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets the artifact with the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing artifact with the supplied data. Returns bad request on bad URI, constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the artifact with the specified ID. Cascades delete to related records.

get.summary: Gets the solution revisions that use the specified artifact.
Gets a page of catalogs, optionally sorted. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new catalog and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on bad URL, constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the set of distinct catalog publishers. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Searches for catalogs with attributes matching the values specified as query parameters. Defaults to match all (conjunction); send junction query parameter '_j=o' to match any (disjunction).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets a page of solutions in the specified catalogs, optionally sorted; empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets the catalogs where the specified solution is published; empty if none are found.
Gets the list of catalog IDs that are favorites of the specified user; empty if none are found.
Gets the catalog for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing catalog with the supplied data. Returns bad request on bad URI, constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the catalog with the specified ID. Cascades delete to related tables. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets the count of solutions in the specified catalog.

post.summary: Publishes the specified solution to the specified catalog. Answers bad request if an ID is invalid.

delete.summary: Removes the specified solution from the specified solution.

post.summary: Marks the specified catalog as a favorite of the specified user. Answers bad request if an ID is invalid.

delete.summary: Removes the specified catalog as a favorite of the specified user.

get.summary: Gets the list of value set names that can be used to fetch code-name pairs.
Gets the list of code-name pairs for the specified value set. Returns bad request if the value set is not found.

post.summary: Creates a new document object and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on bad URI, constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the document object for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing document with the supplied data. Returns bad request on bad URI, constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the document with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Checks the health of the application by querying the database.
Gets a page of license profile templates, optionally sorted on fields. Returns empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new license profile template. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the license profile template for the specified ID. Returns null if not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing license profile template with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the license profile template with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of notifications, optionally sorted; empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new notification and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the count of notifications.

post.summary: Creates a new user notification preference. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets notification preferences for the specified user ID. Returns empty if not found.
Gets the user notification preference for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing user notification preference with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the user notification preference with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of active notifications for the specified user; returns empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets the count of unread active notifications for the specified user.

put.summary: Updates an existing notification with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the notification with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

post.summary: Adds the specified user as a recipient of the notification. Returns bad request if an ID is not found.

put.summary: Records that the user viewed the notification by storing the current date and time. Returns bad request if an ID is not found.

delete.summary: Drops the specified user as a recipient of the notification.

get.summary: Gets a page of peers, optionally sorted; empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new peer and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Searches for peers with attributes matching the values specified as query parameters. Defaults to match all (conjunction); send junction query parameter '_j=o' to match any (disjunction).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new entity with a generated ID. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the peer subscription for the specified ID. Returns null if not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing peer subscription with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the entity with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets the peer with the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing peer with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the peer with the specified ID. Cascades delete to peer subscriptions. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets all subscriptions for the specified peer. Returns empty if none are found
Gets count of subscriptions for the specified peer.
Gets a page of publish requests, optionally sorted on fields. Returns empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new publish request with a generated ID. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Searches for publish requests with attributes matching the values specified as query parameters. Defaults to match all (conjunction); send junction query parameter '_j=o' to match any (disjunction).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets the publish request for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing publish request with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the publish request with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets the artifacts for the specified solution revision. Answers empty if none are found.

post.summary: Adds the specified artifact to the specified solution revision. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Removes the specified artifact from the specified solution revision.

get.summary: Gets the description for the specified revision and catalog. Returns null if not found.

post.summary: Creates a new description for the specified revision and catalog. Returns bad request if an ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing description with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the description with the specified IDs. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets the documents for the specified revision and catalog.

post.summary: Adds a user document to the specified revision and catalog.

delete.summary: Removes a document from the specified revision and catalog.

get.summary: Gets a page of roles, optionally sorted on fields. Returns empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new role and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the count of roles.
Searches for roles with attributes matching the values specified as query parameters. Defaults to match all (conjunction); send junction query parameter '_j=o' to match any (disjunction).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets the role for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing role with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the role with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets the functions for the specified role. Returns empty if none are found.

post.summary: Creates a new role function and generates an ID. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the role function with the specified ID. Returns null if not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing role function with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the role function with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of right-to-use objects, optionally sorted on fields. Returns empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new RTU object and generates an ID. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets a page of RTU references, optionally sorted. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new RTU reference. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the right-to-use objects to which the specified reference is mapped. Returns empty if none are found.

delete.summary: Deletes the specified RTU reference. Returns bad request if not found.

get.summary: Searches for right-to-use objects with attributes matching the values specified as query parameters. Defaults to match all (conjunction); send junction query parameter '_j=o' to match any (disjunction).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets a list of right-to-use objects for the specified solution and user. Returns empty if none are found.
Gets the right-to-use object for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing RTU object with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the RTU object with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

post.summary: Adds the specified reference to the specified RTU. Answers bad request if the RTU ID is invalid.

delete.summary: Removes the specified reference from the specified RTU.

get.summary: Gets all users mapped to the specified RTU. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Adds the specified user to the specified RTU. Answers bad request if an ID is invalid.

delete.summary: Removes the specified user from the specified RTU.

get.summary: Gets a page of site configurations, optionally sorted on fields. Returns empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new site configuration object. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the site configuration for the specified key. Returns null if not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing site configuration with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the site configuration with the specified key. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of site content objects, optionally sorted on fields. Returns empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new site content object. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the site content object for the specified key. Answers null if the key is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing site content object with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the site content object with the specified key. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of solutions, optionally sorted. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new solution and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the count of solutions.
Searches for solutions with attributes matching the values specified as query parameters. Defaults to match all (conjunction); send junction query parameter '_j=o' to match any (disjunction).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Finds published solutions based on specified catalog and date query parameters. Limits result to solutions, revisions, artifacts etc. modified after the specified time, expressed in milliseconds since the Epoch.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Searches for solutions with names or descriptions that contain the search term using the like operator. Answers empty if none are found.

Finds solutions with attribute values and/or child attribute values matching the field name - field value pairs specified as query parameters. Supports faceted search; i.e., check for kw1 in name, kw2 in description and so on.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Finds published solutions matching the specified attribute values and/or   child attribute values with flexible handling of tags to allow all/any matches.  Checks multiple fields for the supplied keywords, including ID, name, description etc.

parameters.name: alltag
parameters.description: All tags, solution must have every one

parameters.name: anytag
parameters.description: Any tags, solution must have at least one

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets a page of solutions tagged with the specified tag. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets a page of solutions editable by the specified user and matching all query parameters. Keywords are processed using LIKE-operator search.  Does not search any child entities.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets the member solution IDs in the specified composite solution. Answers empty if none are found.

post.summary: Adds the specified member (child) to the specified composite solution (parent). Returns bad request if an ID is not found.

delete.summary: Removes the specified member (child) from the specified composite solution (parent).

get.summary: Gets the solution for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing solution with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the solution with the specified ID. Cascades the delete to related entities. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of download details for the specified solution's artifacts. Returns empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new solution download object with a generated ID. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the solution download object with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets the image for the specified solution ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Saves or updates a solution image. Returns bad request if the ID is not found or the image is too large.

get.summary: Gets a page of user ratings for the specified solution. Returns empty if none are found.
Gets the rating for the specified solution and user. Returns null if not found

post.summary: Creates a new solution rating. Returns bad request on constrain violation etc.

put.summary: Updates an existing solution rating with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the solution rating for the specified IDs. Returns bad request if not found.

get.summary: Gets all revisions for the specified solution IDs. Answers empty if none are found.

post.summary: Creates a new revision and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the solution revision for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing revision with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the revision with the specified ID. Cascades delete to related records. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of deployments for the specified solution and revision IDs. Returns empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new deployment record for the specified solution and revision. Returns bad request if an ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing deployment record with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the deployment record with the specified IDs. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of deployments for the specified solution, revision and user IDs. Returns empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets all tags assigned to the specified solution ID. Answers empty if none are found.

post.summary: Adds the specified tag to the specified solution. Creates the tag if necessary. Returns bad request if the solution ID is not found.

delete.summary: Removes the specified tag from the specified solution. Returns bad request if either is not found.

put.summary: Increments the view count of the specified solution (special case of update). Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of solution tags, optionally sorted. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new solution tag. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the specified solution tag. Returns bad request if not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of tasks, optionally sorted on fields. Returns empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new task with a generated ID. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Searches for tasks with attributes matching the values specified as query parameters. Defaults to match all (conjunction); send junction query parameter '_j=o' to match any (disjunction).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new task step result with a generated ID. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Searches for step results with attributes matching the values specified as query parameters. Defaults to match all (conjunction); send junction query parameter '_j=o' to match any (disjunction).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets the task step result with the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing task step result with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the task step result with the specified ID. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets the task for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing task with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the task with the specified ID. Cascades the delete to associated step results. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets all step results associated with the specified task ID. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets a page of threads, optionally sorted. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new thread and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the count of threads.
Gets a page of threads for the solution and revision IDs, optionally sorted. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets a page of comments for the specified solution and revision IDs, optionally sorted. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets the count of comments in all threads for the specified solution and revision IDs.
Gets the count of threads for the solution and revision IDs.
Gets the thread for the specified ID. Returns null if an ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing thread with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the thread with the specified ID. Cascades to comments in the thread. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of comments in the thread. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new comment and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the count of comments in the specified thread.
Gets the comment for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing comment with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the comment with the specified ID. Returns bad request if an ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets a page of users, optionally sorted on fields. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new user and generates an ID if needed. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

get.summary: Gets the count of users.
Returns a page of users with names that contain the search term matched using  a like operator on the first, middle, last and login-name fields. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Checks the specified credentials for full access. Searches both login name and email fields for the specified name. Returns the user object if an active user exists with the specified credentials; returns bad request if no match is found. Imposes a delay on repeated failures.

Checks the specified credentials for API access. Searches both login name and email fields for the specified name. Returns the user object if an active user exists with the specified credentials; returns bad request if no match is found. Imposes a delay on repeated failures.

put.summary: Adds or removes the specified role for every specified user. Returns bad request if an ID is not found.

get.summary: Gets the count of users with the specified role.
Searches for users with attributes matching the values specified as query parameters. Defaults to match all (conjunction); send junction query parameter '_j=o' to match any (disjunction).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Checks the specified credentials for verification. Searches both login name and email fields for the specified name. Returns the user object if an active user exists with the specified credentials; returns bad request if no match is found. Imposes a delay on repeated failures.

get.summary: Gets the user for the specified ID. Returns null if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing user with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the user with the specified ID. Cascades to related entities: roles, logins, notifications. Returns bad request if the ID is not found.

put.summary: Changes the user's password to the new value if the user exists, is active, and the old password matches. Returns bad request if not found or not matched.

get.summary: Gets a page of solution deployments for the specified user ID. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.summary: Gets a page of solutions that the specified user has marked as favorite. Answers empty if none are found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.summary: Creates a new solution favorite record. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the solution favorite with the specified IDs. Returns bad request if the entity is not found.

get.summary: Gets all login providers for the specified user. Answers empty if none are found.
Gets the login provider for the specified user, provider code and provider login. Returns null if an ID is not found.

post.summary: Creates a new user login provider. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

put.summary: Updates an existing user login provider with the supplied data. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Deletes the specified user login provider. Returns bad request if not found.

get.summary: Gets all roles assigned to the specified user ID. Answers empty if noe are found.

put.summary: Assigns the specified roles to the specified user after dropping any existing assignments. Returns bad request if an Id is not found

post.summary: Adds the specified role to the specified user's roles. Returns bad request if an ID is not found.

delete.summary: Removes the specified role from the specified user's roles.

post.summary: Adds a tag to the user. Returns bad request on constraint violation etc.

delete.summary: Drops a tag from the user. Returns bad request if not found.

get.summary: Gets the server version, which is the value of the MANIFEST.MF property Implementation-Version as written by maven.

ratingAverageTenths.description: Rating average in tenths; e.g., value 35 means 3.5

authors.description: Two-column table with author (name, contact) pairs

sourceId.description: Peer ID where this was on-boarded; null indicates local
